reply_to.body: No offense to anyone but I, personally, think that Pyro is just "run and burn" (w+m1) xD
reply_to.body_tagged: No offense to anyone but I, personally, think that Pyro is just "run and burn" (w+m1) xD

replies.body: that's what the nubs say. Pyro gets hated ALOT because everyone thinks it's w+m1. In reality that isn't true at all. The compression blast is vital plus the flamethrowers' range is short. You can use the flare gun and axe to get some nice combos on the enemies. Alot of kids flock to pyro because of the flamethrower, but Pyro is seriously underrated. That compression blast is really godamn annoying.
replies.body_tagged: that's what the nubs say. Pyro gets hated ALOT because everyone thinks it's w+m1. In reality that isn't true at all. The compression blast is vital plus the flamethrowers' range is short. You can use the flare gun and axe to get some nice combos on the enemies. Alot of kids flock to pyro because of the flamethrower, but Pyro is seriously underrated. That compression blast is really godamn annoying.

all you gotta do is position yourself right in front of the enemy so that they can't see you but you can see them. Then you just go for the easy haedshot kills.
